message: I propose a fair split, with a slight advantage to me as I'm making the first offer. Let's work together to get the most out of this!
I'll give you a decent amount, but I'm not afraid to negotiate. Your turn to counter!
I think we can both do better than that.  Let's split it more evenly this time.  I'm willing to compromise.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share this time, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
Let's meet in the middle this time. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but we both need to be reasonable to avoid getting nothing at all.
I'm not going to let you take all the profit. It's time to split it 50/50!
